callbehavioraction.name: Conduct infrastructure management inventories including identification, status, type, location, access, and condition

callbehavioraction.name: Conduct inventory management to include enumeration, lists, storage to establish ownership, accessibility, and expectations

callbehavioraction.name: control the infrastructure elements, resources, and services

callbehavioraction.name: Define infrastructure requirements
